judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Oüriam,
Decree vacated and record remanded for appointment of a guardian ad litem to represent decedent’s minor children in the administration of this estate.
Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: Per Oüriam,

attorneys: P. T. Kiniry, with him Reginald L. Pawlowski, and Pawlowski and Kiniry, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Waligora Estate.
Argued March 13,1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
P. T. Kiniry, with him Reginald L. Pawlowski, and Pawlowski and Kiniry, for appellant.
G. Harry Isaacson, for appellee.
May 4, 1973:
